shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes receiving all remote users' video streams.
Stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams.

section.p: This method takes effect for all remote users who have joined or will join the channel via joinChannel, and is equivalent to autoSubscribeVideo in . Make sure to call this method after joining a channel.
Call this method after joining a channel. After calling this method, the local user stops or resumes subscribing to all remote users' video streams, including those who join the channel later.
section.note: If you call muteAllRemoteVideoStreams(true) after joining a channel, the local user stops receiving all users' video streams in the channel, including those who join after the method is called.

If you call or after calling this method, the last call takes effect. By default, the SDK automatically subscribes to all remote users' video streams when you join a channel. You can set autoSubscribeVideo to in when calling joinChannel to cancel subscribing to all users' video streams upon joining.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Call this method after joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to stop receiving all remote video streams:
: Stop receiving all remote video streams.
: Resume receiving all remote video streams.

Whether to stop subscribing to all remote users' video streams.
: Stop subscribing to all remote users' video streams.
: (Default) Subscribe to all remote users' video streams.
